name: New Creature

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120/300 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage in melee, or 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage at range, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: A Wisdom Action
entries: Must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw.

legendaryHeader: This is a legendary action intro

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the new creature fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Regeneration (Vampire)
entries: The new creature regains 20 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the new creature takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the new creature's next turn.
